cause.description:
my cell phone fell in the toilet today =/
urine got on it, not just mine either because the toilet wasn't flushed, so i had to clean it too. it's not sanitary anymore.
if you see me at school, please feel free to donate 1$, although i don't think i'll get any donations lol.
i put that nonprofit organization because i thought the title matched my situation, so i don't think you can donate via website/facebook if u wanted to...though i don't think anyone would want to.
thanks in advance for looking
-Bryant
1. flushing toilets at school
2. water proof phones
3. my dad not jumping to conclusions
cause.name: My Cellphone fell in the school toilet.
